content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (connection issues)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (fuel: 22 coal)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (reappeared but not connected)
- Pipe networks with connection issues

### New electricity generation system at x=-6.0 y=-0.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-9.5 y=-0.5 (connection issues)
- Offshore pump at x=-9.5 y=2.5 (connection issues)
- Boiler at x=-8.0 y=0.5 (fuel: 4 coal)
- Boiler at x=-6.0 y=-0.5 (fuel: 20 coal)
- Partial pipe connections at x=-9.5 y=0.5 (water connection incomplete)
- Missing steam engine (placement still failing)

### Copper mining operation at x=-55.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-55.5 y=70.5 (no power)
- Burner inserter at x=-55.5 y=72.5 (fuel: 9 coal)
- Stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 (fuel: 10 coal)
- Wooden chest at x=-55.5 y=76.5 (empty)

### Expanded iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(Updated from previous report)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at x=16.0 y=71.0 (fuel: 18 coal, output blocked)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 (fuel: 6 coal, no ingredients)
- Wooden chest at x=16.5 y=75.5 (empty)
- Missing transport between drill and furnace (ore not reaching furnace)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement and verification
- Verify water positions before pump placement (multiple offshore pump placement failures at invalid water locations)
- Move within placement range before attempting placement (failed to place at x=-11.0 y=70.0 from 60.5,60.5)
- Implement proper error handling for get_entity calls (burner inserter not found at x=16.5 y=72.5)

### Resource management
- Monitor fuel inventory before insertion attempts (multiple coal insertion failures due to empty inventory)
- Clear blocked outputs before operation (burner mining drill at x=16.0 y=71.0 blocked by ground items)
- Ensure proper transport between production steps (furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 has no ingredients despite working drill)

### Production chain setup
- Verify all production chain components are connected (iron plate production failing due to missing transport)
- Implement proper output handling (drill output blocked with no receiving entity)
- Monitor furnace input requirements (furnace shows "no ingredients" warning despite nearby ore)

### Inventory tracking
- Track fuel consumption (coal inventory dropped to 7)
- Verify chest contents before extraction attempts (failed to extract iron plates from empty chest)
- Maintain minimum fuel reserves (multiple insertion attempts failed due to no coal)

### System verification
- Implement comprehensive pre-operation checks (multiple consecutive placement/insertion failures)
- Verify entity connections after placement (offshore pumps still show connection issues)
- Monitor system status indicators (drill shows "waiting for space" warning)
